document.full_text: nasa is set to announce on tuesday final museum berths for its retiring space shuttles, whose mothballing this year will hand over human space transportation to former arch-rival russia 50 years after the first human space flight.
document.title: space to museums: shuttles to get retirement berths
lines_and_colors: nasa is set to announce on tuesday final museum berths for its retiring space shuttles, whose mothballing this year will hand over human space transportation to former arch-rival russia 50 years after the first human space flight.
